title: Reaper
description: The world has changed. My story begins nearly a century after humanity created its own apocalypse. In a new, safe city on the western coast, we are all are civilized and upstanding citizens. Except sometimes, I need to breathe. I need to escape and live outside of the rules. But today, my obsession with freedom might cost me my life. And my executioner may very well be the man of my dreams. Only now, he could become a nightmare... This is a complete story. Each book in the series can be read as a Standalone. Discover a city rebuilt from the ashes of humanity's technological obsession. A city of serenity and peace that is threatened by old secrets and new enemies. Discover this series, called "More than just a romance", "Exciting, fast-paced" and "Romance with a Dystopian Adventure!"
author: Lindsey Winsemius
